description: Revitalization of Rural Areas: Opportunities posed by rural networking and economic diversification

subproject.description: Initial interventions by the Autonomous Province of Vojvodina and Ministry of Agriculture in Serbia met with challenges in decreasing temporary and even permanent loss of social capital in a number of rural areas. Therefore, this project supports the Government’s efforts to address the urban-rural disparities by increasing rural social capital and services.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Strengthening of Rural Social

title: Rural Development
